mr::simple_timer Class Reference

#include <mrProfile.h>

Inheritance diagram for mr::simple_timer:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Very simple class/macro for profiling stuff... Just use MR_TIME_IT macro and enclose area in {}, like...

      {
        MR_TIME_IT;
         ....stuff to profile...
      }  // here it will print result
